Articles.Content:
hello forums,

I was playing around with space planes and taking them to the mun after some inspiration form Scot, (

), i was using the translation controls to simulate lift. This got me thinking and i was wondering if some clever moding type prison would be able to make a mod that would control the RCS and simulate this automatically. adjust 'lift' thrust for different speed and so on, and make it possible to fly over the mun like you were flying over Kurben.

if some one could maybe look at the feasibility of this ans try to make something would be grate.

thanks
kOS could be used for something like that.
Not as cool as your idea, but MechJeb's Translatron might get you close. Try the Keep Vert button. I'm going to try it when I get home.
kOS could indeed be used for this. I have even proposed a true fly by wire function a while ago, so that you could implement this in the purest form.
